data.text: Today PM @BorisJohnson is in Northern Ireland with Secretary of State for Northern Ireland @JulianSmithUK. They are meeting each of Northern Irelandâ€™s main political parties for discussions on restoring the devolved institutions.
If Kasab was alive today, even he would have claimed that Tukaram Omble forced him to chant Jai Shri Ram, and voila!
